headline: LyondellBasell to address 2025 Goldman Sachs Industrials and Materials Conference
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Nov. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB), a leader in the global chemical industry, today announced Agustin Izquierdo, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the 2025 Goldman Sachs Industrials and Materials Conference in New York on Wednesday, December 3, 2025, at 9:20 a.m. EST. Webcast and Presentation Slides AccessA live webcast can be accessed at the time of the event at https://investors.lyondellbas
